Package javelin.model.world.location.town.quest

Class Quest

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.location.town.quest.Quest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiscoverTerrain, DiscoverTown, Discovery, Fetch, Kill, Pilgrimage, Pursue, War
    public abstract class Quest
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A task that can be completed for money and reputation. Non-hostile towns will have an active number of them equal to their Rank tier. Quests are timed and most of them require you to come back in that time frame to collect your reward.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected class  Quest.QuestMarker
      Simple generic World actor to use with quests.

      • QUESTS

        public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends Quest>>> QUESTS
        All available quest templates.

      • town

        public final Town town
        Town this quest was generated for.

      • el

        protected int el
        Encounter level. Default is Town.population.

      • daysleft

        public int daysleft
        Quest becomes invalid once it reaches zero.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        Name of the quest. Used as a locally-exclusive identifier per Town.

      • reward

        public int reward
        Amount of gold to be awarded upon completion.

        protected int distance

        For Reflection compatibility, all subclasses should respect this constructor signature.
        Parameters:
        t - Town this quest is active in.

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public abstract boolean validate()
        Returns:
        If false, don't use this object as a quest.

      • define

        protected void define()
        A chance to further define details after validation.

      • isactive

        public boolean isactive()
        Returns:
        true if this is still listed as active in its respective Town.

      • reward

        protected int reward()
        Returns:
        By default returns a proper amount of gold for the quest's el (capped by city size).

      • complete

        public abstract boolean complete()
        Note that a quest can be fulfilled but if daysleft has expired, players won't be able to complete it as it will have been removed from town.
        Returns:
        If true, the quest is considered completed and a Squad may claim the reward.

      • cancel

        public boolean cancel()
        Returns:
        true if a quest is to be cancelled permanently. For example: a location needs to be captured but the location itself is removed by some external force.

      • getname

        protected abstract java.lang.String getname()
        Returns:
        A descriptive, permanent name for this quest.
        See Also:
        equals(Object), validate()

      • generate

        public static Quest generate​(Town t)
        Returns:
        A brand-new, valid quest or null if couldn't generate any.
